response.overview: Plotting The Northern Stars is a compelling documentary following Angelo Raza, an emerging artist with Malagasy heritage, on a six-month journey to create a multicultural musical masterpiece in Northern Australia. Tasked with leading an eclectic band—featuring an American drummer, Aboriginal singer, Japanese percussionist, Jamaican rapper, and more—Angelo faces cultural clashes, creative struggles, and logistical hurdles to bring his vision to life. This inspiring film showcases the resilience and power of music to unite diverse voices, transcending borders. With a vibrant setting and powerful personal stories, Plotting The Northern Stars celebrates collaboration, creativity, and the universal language of music, offering an uplifting narrative that will resonate globally
response.tagline: The story of the band of bands
response.title: Plotting The Northern Stars
